name: Beebuzz Soccer
description:
Guess what? You are the new coach of a fresh hive of excited young soccer players in their first ever game! Did I mention they're all bees? Do your best to move your team (and the ball!) to the net and score!

No bees or Under-5 soccer players were harmed in the making of this game.

Premise: If you've ever seen a bunch of 3-6 year olds playing soccer/football, anywhere in the world, you've probably seen that super cute thing where whenever the ball comes near, all the players chase and bunch like a swarm of bees. They're in their own little world, playing for fun. A quick Google Image Search for "beehive soccer" or "bunch ball soccer" will show you what I mean. 

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38.
